page.title: 15MY FARM IN MOELFRE
page.content: I live on a farm of 130 acres in Moelfre.My father keeps 50 Friesian cows for milking. We deliver milk to the houses, shops and restaurants in the village. We have 70 sheep and 100 lambs and two rams. I have 20 chickens of my own and I sell the eggs to local people. At this time of year my father is busy cutting silage to feed the cows in the winter. He also makes hay later on, and I like to help him. There is always plenty of work to do on the farm. We have a caravan site on the farm which my mother looks after. Ieuan Evans, Nant Bychan Farm.
